article_title: So Which Walmart Workers Should Lose Their Jobs Then?

article_metadata.description: Given that we've just had Black Friday, Thanksgiving and all that, there's obviously, over on the left side of the newspaper universe, pieces talking about how terrible it is that people have to work in stores on those days, unable to partake of the traditional family festivities and so on. [...]
article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall
